summary: Provides a mechanism to execute code blocks atomically by managing database transactions and savepoints, usable both as a decorator and a context manager. It creates a transaction or a savepoint on entry, commits or releases on successful exit, and rolls back on errors, supporting reentrancy and optional savepoint suppression while being thread‑local safe.
business_intent: Simplify and guarantee atomicity of database operations, ensuring consistent commit/rollback behavior without manual transaction handling.
